name: Behind The Lines
description:
Behind The Lines is a little battle royale like,  I make in 3 days, in first person where you play as a survivor of a battle in a city. Lost, you must survive against the others soldiers who's left alive in the night.



Controls : 

  • WASD : Move
  • Mouse Movement : Look Around
  • Left Mouse Button : Fire
  • R : Reload

Hand Assets by 3DMaesen : https://sketchfab.com/bumstrum
